ygData.subject: Re: My remaining big questions...
ygData.msgSnippet: I played since beta 1 and tinkering was not implimented untill the very end of phase 4.. and even then it was essentially non-functioning... You say robots
ygData.messageBody:
I played since beta 1 and tinkering was not implimented untill the very end
of phase 4.. and even then it was essentially non-functioning... You say
robots were taken out? I don't know where you heard this rumor.. there NEVER
ever were robots.. not even the notion. I remember a post back in beta
asking about this.. and all the gm had to say was that it would unbalance
the game uncontrolably.. and it would. Imagine a wizard with a robot pet...
or something like that. Anyway just wanted to clear that up..
----- Original Message -----
From: <igbot@...>
To: <EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, November 04, 1999 10:27 AM
Subject: [EQ_Tinkering] My remaining big questions...


> From: igbot@...
>
> 1. Whats the lodestone for at our new merchant?
>
> 2. Has anyone done any research into the unstable firewater mentioned in
the
> journal? The one that sent a firework screaming into the storage
facility?
> I tried several combinations of multiple Gnomish Spirits and water, but
no
> progress.
>
> 3. Any idea where this "storage cavern" mentioned is?
>
> 4. I tried combining a stalking probes and a firewater from the other
reference
> in the first (2nd?) journal. Where Gimble was afraid the probe could
> explode (funny, I'm HOPING the dam probes will explode! :) Anyone
else
> try stuff along this line?
>
> 5. Anyone do tinkering when EQ was beta? Any formulas for robots and such?
> I know they were taken out, but maybe such recipes would give clues.
>
> 6. Anyone find any use for the small power sources and function force
modules
> found in Solusek?
>
> >
